remarks: Limit of the imaginary part of a sequence.  Proposition 12-2.4(c) of [Gleason] p. 172.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Jun-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2014.)
statement:
climcn1lem.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climcn1lem.2 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) $.
climcn1lem.4 $e |- ( ph -> G e. W ) $.
climcn1lem.5 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climcn1lem.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
climim.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) = ( Im ` ( F ` k ) ) ) $.
climim $p |- ( ph -> G ~~> ( Im ` A ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
